-	script	GlobalBossId	-1,{
	end;
	
OnInit:
	if($global_boss_id_version != 5){
		$global_boss_id_version = 5;
		
		deletearray $all_boss_ids[0],getarraysize($all_boss_ids);

		setarray $all_boss_ids[0],1038,1039,1046,1059,1086,1087,1112,1115,1147,1150,1157,1159,1190,1251,1252,1272,1312,1373,1389,1399,1418,1492,1502,1511,1583,1623,1630,1646,1647,1648,1649,1650,1651,1658,1685,1688,1708,1719,1734,1751,1768,1779,1785,1832,1871,1874,1876,1885,1917,1980,2022,2052,2068,2075,2087,2094,2095,2096,2097,2098,2099,2100,2101,2103,2104,2105,2106,2107,2108,2109,2110,2111,2112,2113,2131,2156,2165,2202,2235,2236,2237,2238,2239,2240,2241,2249,2251,2253,2255,2319,2341,2362,2441,2442,2443,2444,2445,2446,2447,2448,2449,2483,2529,2532,2533,2534,2535,2996,3074,3426,3427,3428,3429,3430,3450,3473,3621,3628,3633,3758,20381;
		
		$all_boss_id_size = getarraysize($all_boss_ids);
	}
	end;
}
